caption: Additional Restriction
description: Details about supplementary restrictions and guardrails that may limit the granted access, applied through additional policy types such as Resource Control Policies (RCPs) and Service Control Policies (SCPs) in AWS, or other policy constraints.
name: additional_restriction

policy.description: Specifies the details of the policy that define this additional restriction.

status.description: The normalized status of the additional restriction, normalized to the caption of the status_id enum value.

status_id.description: The normalized status identifier of the additional restriction indicating whether this restriction is applicable.

3.caption: Evaluation Failure
3.description: This restriction could not be evaluated.
